00104 class stPlainDiskPageManager: public stPageManager{
00105    public:
00115       stPlainDiskPageManager(const char * fName, stSize pagesize);
00116

00177 
00192       virtual void ReleasePage(stPage * page);
00193 
00206       virtual stPage * GetNewPage();
00207 
00216       virtual void WritePage(stPage * page);
00217 
00225       virtual void WriteHeaderPage(stPage * headerpage);
00226 
00237       virtual void DisposePage(stPage * page);
00238 
00243       virtual stSize GetMinimumPageSize(){
00244          return header->PageSize;
00245       }//end GetMinimumPageSize
00246       
00253       void SetSystemCache(bool enabled){
00254          // Nothing to do.. at least for now.
00255       }//end SetSystemCache
00256       
00257    private:
00258       #pragma pack(1)
00259 
00262       struct tHeader{
00266          char Magic[4];
00267          
00271          stSize PageSize;
00272          
00277          stSize PageCount;
00278          
00282          stSize UsedPages;
00283 
00288          stPageID Available;
00289       };//end tHeader
00290       #pragma pack()
00291       
00295       typedef stInstanceCache <stPage, stPageAllocator> stPageInstanceCache;
00296 
00301       stPageInstanceCache * pageInstanceCache;
00302       
00306       int fd;
00307       
00312       tHeader * header;
00313 
00319       stLockablePage * headerPage;

00328

00336       
00343       stSize PageID2Offset(stPageID pageid){
00344          return pageid * header->PageSize;
00345       }//end PageID2Offset
00346
